entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 23 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
